abstract: police hunt suspects after masked men carrying crowbars raid jewellers .
article: the incident happened yesterday in warwicka manhunt is underway after three masked men wielding crowbars stormed a jewellers . the men got into hamilton 's jewellers in market place , warwick , yesterday afternoon shortly before they closed . police received reports of three men entering the shop with crowbars and wearing balaclavas . fortunately , there were no reports of any injuries . however , police are now searching for those responsible and are urging anyone who might have seen the incident to contact police . google mapscoventry man still hunted by police three years after father-of-two 's murdera spokesman for warwickshire police said : `` at approximately 4.47 pm yesterday , warwickshire police received a report of a robbery at commercial premises in market place , warwick .

`` three men are reported to have entered the premises wearing balaclavas and carrying crowbars , before leaving in a dark coloured vehicle . `` there are no reports of any injuries or any details confirming if anything has been taken at this time . `` anyone who witnessed the incident is asked to call police on 101 , quoting incident number 270 of 16 january .
